Package libs.java.extension.collections.observable

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NotificationListener<E>
    Listener to be implemented by classes to listen for various events, NotificationListener.NotificationEventType.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractNotificationCollection<E>
    Default implementation with Collection methods, to provide notification.
    KeyValue<K,V>
    Used to forward notification in case of map (without creating too many interface, it fixes notification data contained in this bean with key-value
    NotificationCollection<E>
    Base class with methods to ignore creating copy for event.
    NotificationEvent<E>
    Notification event, different values available at different type of notification
    NotificationIterator<E>
    A wrapped iterator, overrides iterator methods and generates event
    NotificationList<E>
    A decorated List which allows notification on different list operation.
    NotificationMap<K,V>
    Observable map.
    NotificationQueue<E>
    Observable Queue.
    NotificationSet<E>
    Observable Set.
    Test  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    NotificationListener.NotificationEventType
